page.title: 20OUR DOMESDAY PROJECT 1985.
page.content: AS YOU MAY KNOW WHEN{WILLIAM THE {CONQUEROR}BECAME KING HE WANTED TO KNOW ALL ABOUT HIS COUNTRY. HE SENT SOME OF HIS MEN TO FIND OUT. THE MEN CAME BACK WITH SCROLLS AND SCROLLS OF INFORMATION. THEY SHOWED IT TO WILLIAM. SAMSON WILLIAM'S SCRIBE WROTE THEM OUT TO MAKE THE "DOMESDAY BOOK". NOW{20000}SCHOOLS ARE UPDATING THE BOOK. THIS PROJECT WILL NOT HOWEVER BE WRITTEN ON{PAPER,}IT WILL BE ON A COMPUTER{DISC.}TWO CLASSES FROM OUR SCHOOL ARE DOING THIS PROJECT. I WAS IN THE FARM GROUP. WE DID ABOUT A FARM CALLED HEMPSTEAD HALL. ANOTHER GROUP DID ABOUT "ST. ANDREW'S CHURCH". THEY INTERVIEWED THE RECTOR OF HOLT. TWO MORE INTERVIEWED ONE OF OUR TEACHERS. EVERBODY WHO TOOK PART IN THE PROJECT ENJOYED IT VERY MUCH. WE LEARNED ALOT FROM IT. THE PEOPLE WHO HELPED WERE VERY KIND AND HELPFUL.
